    • About Rick Canale


    Rick is an educator and coach first and a REALTOR® second. He enjoys educating you, whether you’re a Buyer or Seller, dispelling the many “myths” of buying and selling real estate, and helping you realize the opportunity to fulfill your dreams. As a successful real estate investor, Rick can offer practical and useful advice regardless of whether you are a first-time investor or seasoned pro.
